Met een team van software-ingenieurs, cloudspecialisten, beveiligingsexperts en consultants innoveert en optimaliseert het bedrijf continu, altijd in samenwerking met de klant. Het resultaat is duurzame groei en verbeterde bedrijfsprocessen.


Patrick: "*On top of everything cloud, latest achievement: built a self service analytics platform for customer’s data analysts and engineers.*"

**Verdien 1000 euro sign-on bonus**
-----------------------------------


Waarom solliciteren via Recruit2? Onze sterke relaties met klanten betekenen dat jouw sollicitatie via ons bureau de voorkeur krijgt in het selectieproces. Wij beloven:

* Uitgebreide ondersteuning om jouw sollicitatie tot een succes te maken. En je hoeft zelf geen motivatiebrief te schrijven ;-)
* Sollicitaties via ons krijgen voorrang en worden sneller behandeld dankzij onze directe lijnen.
* Wij zorgen voor een uitstekende voorbereiding met exclusieve informatie en inzichten over de functie en het bedrijf.


Ook na je sollicitatie blijven we je ondersteunen en bieden we een sign-on bonus van 1000 euro na proeftijd.

**Enthousiast geworden?**
-------------------------


Mis dit niet. Deze baan is populair dus reageer direct!


Wil je eerst meer info? We vertellen je hier graag meer over. Stuur Dionysis Skandalos, Talent Acquisition Specialist, een bericht via email Dionysis@Recruit2.com or WhatsApp.

title: Business Consultant IV (Data)
description:
Business Consultant IV (Data)**At a glance**
---------------


Do you want to be part of the data acceleration in the banking industry as Data Advisor for Data Analytics within Data Management Solutions?


Data Management Solutions is part of the Data Management Grid and responsible for the implementation for the central use case administration of all the Business Intelligence, Analytics and/or Advanced Analytics Use Cases on the Data MarketPlace and guiding the adoption with the relevant stakeholders.


You will work directly with product Owners, engineers, and business counterparts to bring data management solutions from idea to production. As a Data Advisor you translate the strategic vision to the functional implementation of the products and processes, with a strong focus on enabling the Data Users to use the correct and combined processes within the Data Management grid in a governed, traceable and secure manner. We are looking for people that are passionate about data and have a “get it done” mentality. Our Data Advisors have a great understanding of data management, the business needs, a good feel for how to build and implement solutions within an agile way of working.

**Your job**
------------


As an Data Advisor you play a pivotal role in the Data Management Grid.


Some examples of your responsibilities:

* Continuously align with Business Stakeholders to advise on how Data Analytics can bring value for them, and to understand their needs
* Identify potential improvements and gaps in existing products and processes by bringing the outside-in view on Data Analytics
* Translate the strategic vision to the functional implementation of the products and processes
* Actively contribute to the drafting and maintenance of the necessary policy frameworks, policies and standards
* Create awareness and involvement within the organisation by developing learning materials, publications, information meetings and all other forms of communication
* Take care of priority, cooperation, knowledge sharing, and process and capabilities building with regard to the Data Analytics
**Working environment**
-----------------------


The Data Management Grid provide solutions to enable the Data Domains in accelerate data-driven decisions. As a Data Advisor you are part of the Data Management Solutions enablement teams within the Data Management Grid and part of the Central Data Office. This is a central department of Innovation & Technology with a bank-wide responsibility for data management. You work closely together with the Business Stakeholders and users from all business lines of the Bank, and with advisors, product owners and other enthusiastic professionals in the Data Management Grid and Central Data Office.


We have an open and transparent way of working where your opinion is valued, and dialogue is encouraged. The team is diverse with regards to culture, experience and age. The atmosphere is lively and informal, closely monitoring a safe environment where everyone is able to share their thoughts, feelings and worries. It is normal to make mistakes and we aim to help each other grow better as learning is one of our main focuses.


The team you become part of is in constant collaboration with all business lines, international branches, and subsidiaries of the bank. We all work together at the frontier of the largest data revolution in the banking industry and with the core value assets of the organization.

**Your profile**
----------------


Master’s degree or similar


At least 3 years of experience with:

* Business Intelligence, Analytics and/or Advanced Analytics
* Consulting, stakeholder management and Communication.
* New data integration concepts
* Conceptual thinking
* Effective problem solving
* Understanding and bridging the world of Business, Data and IT
* Excellent written & verbal communication skills
* Fluent in English (understanding of Dutch is appreciated)
**We are offering**
-------------------

* The opportunity to be the best you can be, work flexible hours and lots of room to grow both personally and professionally
* The opportunity to pro-actively work on your vitality and fitness
* A supplementary benefit budget of 11%, which you can spend on additional fringe benefits
* A personal development budget of EUR 1.000 per year
* An annual public transportation pass
* A solid pension plan
**Interested?**
---------------


Does this sound like something you’d be interested in? Send us your application as soon as possible. To find out more, contact Anouk van Rosmalen (Anouk.van.rosmalen@nl.abnamro.com). We very much look forward meeting you.

**Equal opportunities for all**
-------------------------------


The success of our organisation depends on the quality of our people and the ideas that they have. Truly surprising insights and innovative solutions for our clients result from an interplay of cultures, knowledge and experience. Diversity is therefore extremely important to our organisation. To ensure that everyone at ABN AMRO can develop their talents, we encourage an inclusive culture in which all colleagues feel engaged and appreciated.

**Disclaimer external recruitment agencies**
--------------------------------------------


External recruitment agencies must have signed an agreement with ABN AMRO BANK N.V., issued by a Talent Acquisition Specialist, in order to submit CVs. Acquisition is therefore not appreciated.

### **Wij vragen**

* Een motiverende kracht
* Een toekomstgerichte mindset
company_description: Bij ABN AMRO hebben we een duidelijke purpose: Banking for better, for generations to come. Samen met onze klanten gaan we de uitdagingen van onze tijd aan en geven we vorm aan de toekomst.

title: System engineer SAS
description:
Bij de Belastingdienst kun je jouw kennis als system engineer inzetten om onze collega's te ondersteunen. Jij zorgt er namelijk voor dat SAS-software veilig wordt gebruikt voor onze processen. Samen met je team zorg je voor de beschikbaarheid van de software en werk je aan technische oplossingen. Een uitdagende functie waarin je bijdraagt aan de digitalisering van onze dienstverlening.

 **Dit doe je bij de Belastingdienst**  

Jij maakt het mogelijk dat onze collega's op een veilige en juiste manier SAS kunnen gebruiken ter ondersteuning van de primaire processen. Je zorgt er samen met je team voor dat de software beschikbaar is op de plekken die we aanbieden.


Ook plan je het LCM en voer je dit uit, los je technische problemen in de dagelijkse operatie op en ben je sparringpartner van onze gebruikers. Daarnaast werk je samen met de keten Analytics aan innovatietrajecten om nieuwe functionaliteiten en mogelijkheden beschikbaar te stellen voor onze gebruikers.  



  

  

**Een bijzondere baan, omdat...*** je bijdraagt aan de veiligheid en beschikbaarheid van cruciale systemen.
* je meewerkt aan innovatieve projecten die nieuwe functionaliteiten en mogelijkheden introduceren.
* je volop de kans krijgt jezelf verder te ontwikkelen op professioneel en persoonlijk gebied.

  

  

  

“De systemen die we al jaren gebruiken, zorgen ervoor dat Nederland blijft draaien. Tegelijkertijd werken we met nieuwe technologieën om het onze interne klanten en burgers makkelijker te maken om belastingzaken te regelen." - Bas, system engineer

 **Wanneer past deze baan bij je?**  

Je hebt minimaal hbo-werk- en -denkniveau in een voor de functie relevante richting.


Je hebt minimaal 5 jaar aantoonbare en relevante werkervaring in een soortgelijke functie.


Je bent een expert op het gebied van SAS in het algemeen en hebt meerdere jaren ervaring met SAS Viya in het bijzonder.


Je hebt deze ervaring zowel aan de gebruikerskant als aan de "infra"-kant.

 **Jouw competenties**  


Analyseren
Omgevingsbewustzijn
Plannen en organiseren
Initiatief
Resultaatgerichtheid  

**De afdeling -** ***Directie Informatievoorziening***  

De directie Informatievoorziening is hét ICT-bedrijf van de Belastingdienst. Met ruim 3.000 collega’s zorgen we dat Nederland kan rekenen op betrouwbare informatievoorzieningen en ICT-systemen. Heel Nederland? Ja, onze ‘klanten’ zijn niet alleen Belastingdienstmedewerkers, maar ook 8.600 grote ondernemers, 2,2 miljoen mkb-ondernemers en 8,5 miljoen burgers. En wist je dat wij werken volgens een agile-mindset? Open, transparant en gericht op leren en kennis delen. Door de toepassing van een DevOps-werkwijze en ons aanbod van geautomatiseerde technieken kunnen de systemen van de Belastingdienst dagelijks miljoenen data en euro’s verwerken.


Bij ons werk je in een moderne tech-organisatie met ménsen als kloppend hart. Of je nu als engineer of in een andere rol bijdraagt aan effectieve ICT; jouw inzet doet ertoe. Net als jouw ontwikkeling, waarin wij graag investeren. En jouw ideeën, waar we graag naar luisteren. Ook is er volop ruimte om samen te innoveren met externe partijen. Niet alleen om te moderniseren, maar vooral om nieuwe producten en diensten te ontwikkelen die passen bij de belevingswereld van burgers, bedrijven en collega’s.

 **De organisatie**  

Belastingdienst  

Bij de Belastingdienst werken ongeveer 25.000 mensen verspreid over het hele land aan een financieel gezond Nederland. Dit doen we door eerlijk en zorgvuldig belastingen en premies volksverzekeringen te heffen, te innen en te controleren en fraude op te sporen. De Belastingdienst maakt het burgers en bedrijven zo gemakkelijk mogelijk om verplichtingen na te kunnen komen en gebruik te kunnen maken van rechten. Dat gebeurt met passende dienstverlening, door massale processen juist en tijdig uit te voeren én door adequaat toezicht uit te oefenen. De Belastingdienst is sterk in ontwikkeling en heeft de ambitie om de beste Belastingdienst voor Nederland te zijn met focus op fiscale taken en vakmanschap. Lees meer over de Belastingdienst op: https://over-ons.belastingdienst.nl

 **Bijzonderheden**  

We ontvangen je brief en cv graag in een Word- of PDF-bestand. Neem in de bestandsnaam jouw voor- en achternaam op. Als je een beroep doet op een voorrangspositie, stuur dan ook een kopie van die kennisgeving mee.


Onze selectieprocedure voor deze functie ziet er als volgt uit:

* Allereerst wordt beoordeeld of een voorrangskandidaat binnen de Rijksoverheid in aanmerking komt voor deze functie.
* Daarna wordt beoordeeld of jouw cv en motivatiebrief voldoen aan de gestelde functie-eisen.


Onderaan deze vacature vind je meer uitleg over de stappen die je doorloopt in de sollicitatieprocedure.


De voorkeur gaat uit naar kandidaten die het meest aansluiten bij het opgestelde profiel. Dit heeft betrekking op zowel de genoemde kennis en werkervaring als op het opleidingsniveau. Vermeld deze daarom duidelijk in je cv.


De Belastingdienst zet zich in voor de banenafspraak: zoveel mogelijk banen realiseren voor mensen met een arbeidsbeperking. Val jij in deze doelgroep? Wij zullen je ondersteunen zodat je optimaal kunt functioneren, en daarmee jouw bijdrage aan Nederland kunt leveren. Of het nu gaat om aanpassingen op je werkplek, bepaalde voorzieningen in het vervoer of bijvoorbeeld vergoedingen van het UWV: samen met jou, je leidinggevende én een jobcoach gaan wij kijken naar jouw kwaliteiten en mogelijkheden om een passend werkpakket uit te voeren. Wil jij weten of je hierbij hoort en wat dit exact betekent voor jou? Lees hier meer.


Een (online) voorselectietest en/of een assessment kan deel uit maken van de sollicitatieprocedure, evenals het maken van een casus, het opvragen van referenties en (online) screening, bijvoorbeeld via databanken, (zoekmachines) en sociale netwerken.


Jouw sollicitatie wordt alleen in behandeling genomen als je met de sollicitatie-button reageert en je cv en motivatiebrief zijn bijgesloten. Na sluitingsdatum is het niet meer mogelijk om je sollicitatie in behandeling te nemen. Houd er rekening mee dat het solliciteren technische problemen met zich mee kan brengen. Wacht hiermee dus niet tot het laatste moment.


Wanneer je solliciteert op een functie maak je eenmalig een account aan. Met je account kan je de status van je sollicitatie inzien.
company_description: De Belastingdienst is 24 uur per dag, 7 dagen per week in bedrijf. We werken aan een financieel gezond Nederland door eerlijk en zorgvuldig belastingen te heffen, te innen en toezicht uit te oefenen.

title: Product Manager Analytics Platform
description:
As Product Manager Analytics Platform you steer a multi-disciplinary squad in the delivery of platforms that support advanced analytics teams throughout Rabobank, directly contributing to the ambition of Rabobank to become an even better data driven enterprise!

**You and your job**  

As Product Manager Analytics Platform you are the product lead for one specific Analytics Platform component and responsible for a multi-disciplinary squad of Platform Engineers, ML Engineers, and Business Analysts. You understand our user’s needs and requirements which enables you to continuously ensure that the Analytics Platform adds value to our users throughout Rabobank and evolves with their needs. In this role you are responsible for the product vision, roadmap and for the day-to-day delivery of your squad (incl. prioritization of the product backlog, managing risks, dependencies, and timelines). Your focus lies also on team work by connecting team members from different backgrounds and by emphasising the importance of collaboration (“achieving results together as a team”).

**PracticalExamples**

* Develop a product vision and roadmap.
* Interact with the enterprise-wide user group of our Analytics Platforms
* Prioritize your backlog, have stand-ups, and sprint planning sessions with your squad.

**Facts & Figures**

* Being part of a team of 280+ data & analytics professionals within Tribe Global Data & Analytics Platform.
* The Area Analytics Platform is responsible for One!Lab, the Model Serving Platform, Reporting Platform and Insights Platform. We support advanced analytics solutions and squads throughout Rabobank.

**Top 3 responsibilities**

* Be curious, build relationships and translate business needs to an Analytics Platform that our users love and our business needs.
* Prioritize your backlog, manage stakeholders, associated risks, dependencies, and timelines
* Focus on team collaboration and set the stage for others to learn, to have fun and to excel.

**Together we achieve more than alone**  

Collaboration is at the heart of everything we do. The team brings diverse and talented people together to perform the best they can.

*“I enjoy the fast-paced dynamics within Tribe GDAP. The Product Manager role is truly diverse. You go from strategic sessions with stakeholders where you try to find the fit and value of our platform for their business challenge, to the nitty gritty details of building that product during a refinement with your team.”*Milou Graas, Area Lead Analytics Platform


You will be part of a very dynamic and international team including highly motivated team members.


Working together is the way we work; as 1 results-driven, data-minded, and analytical team at Rabobank. Talking of Rabobank: We are a Dutch bank that operates in 38 countries for over 9,5000,000 customers. Together with these customers, our members, and partners we stand side by side to create a world in which everyone has access to enough healthy food. In the Netherlands we work to create a country in which people are happy with how they live, work, and do business.

**You and your talent**

* Master or PhD degree.
* >3 years of relevant working experience in analytics and/or tech.
* Experience with product delivery and stakeholder management.
* Experience in guiding and motivating multidisciplinary teams. You are naturally focused on teamwork and easily connect people from different backgrounds.
* Excellent communication, organizational and collaboration skills.
* Affinity/tendency to interact with (new) technologies.
* Solid understanding of DevOps principles and practices, with working experience in scaled Agile/Scrum environments.

**This is what we offer**

* A contract for 36-hours in Scale 9 with a minimum salary of € 4.292, - and maximum of € 6.130, - gross a month depending on experience.
* An Employee Benefit Budget (11% of your monthly salary). You decide how to spend this budget. This may include purchasing extra leave days, making extra pension contributions or even receiving a monthly cash pay-out.
* Thirteenth month's salary and 8% holiday allowance.
* Personal development budget of €1400.
* A pension scheme to which you contribute 3,5% or 5,5%.
* Hybrid working: we work 1 or 2 days a week from the office.

This is a selection of the terms of employment based on 36 hours a week. You can find all terms of employment on rabobank.jobs/en/conditions-of-employment.  
* 

**You and the job application process**

* Apply to the vacancy for Product Manager Analytics Platform.
* Any questions about the job content? Contact: Milou Graas Area Lead, via milou.graas@rabobank.nl
* Any questions about working at Rabobank and the process? Contact Lisa Boschma via lisa.boschma@rabobank.nl#LI-LB
* We will hold the interviews through a video call.
* You can find answers to the most frequently asked questions on rabobank.jobs/en/faq.
* A security check is part of the process.
* We respect your privacy.

title: Senior Java Developer
description:
**Who we are?**


ING is setting the trend for the Dutch and global wholesale banking industry. Market Risk team is a part of Financial Markets within Wholesale Banking Tech. We develop and maintain advanced (real-time) analytics solutions for internal end users and tools that facilitate processing huge amounts of data.

**The challenge**


Active Pivot is an important part of Competitive Pricing area allowing risk managers to analyse trade data coming from various deal capture systems within the bank (e.g. Summit, Murex). We deliver VaR, PnL and Risk metrics that enable our stakeholders to do daily market & credit risk analysis for decision making on portfolio risks and limit monitoring.


In addition, we play a key role for internal and regulatory reporting by providing a sign off process to guarantee correctness of figures and by allowing slice and dice on aggregated data coming from all input systems, regardless of data format.


As we have broadened our scope recently, new applications were onboarded to support additional business requirements like facilitating the explanation of VaR figures or applying the regulatory aggregation and calculation rules to provide Market Risk Managers with the capital requirements.


Our team's portfolio is diverse, containing a significant number of projects: several main applications developed on top of Active Pivot framework and many other in-house applications to support all the business flows.


As a **developer in Active Pivot** team, you will:

* Develop in-memory OLAP hypercubes built on top of ActivePivot technology, allowing users to slice and dice, aggregate and join the data from various sources.
* Implement data processing tools and services based on Spring, SpringBoot, JPA.
* Create front-end components with React.JS, Angular or other UI technologies.
* Reduce the complexity of the system by improving and aligning the applications.
* Design and develop automated unit, integration and regression tests.
* Work with large data sets and real-time analytics and have a strong focus on performance.
* Transform business requirements into functional design, estimate and plan development with your team and the Product Owner.
* Collaborate with Operations Engineers to promote developments to Production.

**Who are you?**

We are looking for an enthusiastic team player, who is technically passionate, solution-focussed and able to design, develop, test and maintain high-quality software. We expect you to be responsible and take ownership. Be open, honest, communicate clearly and most importantly, be eager to learn and proactively improve yourself and the ecosystem around you. The system is continuously changing and we are constantly on the lookout for innovative creative solutions and ideas. Your proactive and results-oriented attitude ensures that you always strive for the best result. Banking does not have to be boring!

**Technical requirements:**

* Education at Bachelor/Master level with a strong analytical background, preferably in Computer Science.
* Certifications and/or proven proficiency in core Java.
* Experience with dependency injection framework.
* Experience or affinity with IT security concepts.
* Experience in developing automated testing.
* Experience in Continuous Delivery.
* Good understanding of Software Architectures.
* Work experience in an Agile organization and proven Agile mind-set.

**Soft skills:**

* Excellent team player in an international team, service oriented, customer centric, eager to learn and to coach others.
* You are **curious** and understand the latest developments in the technical and financial services.
* You are able to discuss with your stakeholders and product owner about features and stories and can translate these into software with real **business value**.
* Good communication skills in English.

**Nice to have:**

* Familiarity with Azure DevOps
* Experience with Ansible
* Experience with Active Pivot
company_description: With 9 million account holders, ING is one of the largest and most prominent financial service providers in the Netherlands. We are part of ING Group, a global financial institution.
ceo_name: Steven van Rijswijk, CEO ING Group

title: Senior Engineer
description:
**About Eagle Eye Networks**
Eagle Eye Networks is the world's leading cloud video surveillance platform. Powered by an ever evolving set of powerful AI and analytics, our open platform provides global security, instantaneous visibility and customizable insights directly to our customers on the Web, Desktop and Mobile.  

  

**Ove****rview**


Eagle Eye Networks is seeking a Senior Software Engineer who will play a leadership role in the architecture, design, development, test and overall product life cycle of Eagle Eagle Eye Network’s flagship devices and services. You will be responsible for technical guidance, mentorship and development of a team of engineers. You are a fast learner with deep knowledge of computer science fundamentals, data structures and algorithms with excellent programming & debugging skills. A start-up mindset is required as we are always looking for creative ways to take on and solve new challenges.  

  

**Key Responsibilities**

* 8-10 Years of Linux application development experience in C/C++ programming environments
* Hands-on debugging skills, tracking down memory leaks, segmentation fault
* Experience in scalable distributed systems, event driven multithreaded state machines using C Programming, utilizing Linux APIs (e.g. glib, libev, pthreads, etc.)
* Solid understanding of OS concepts/fundamentals, Linux, process, signals, multi-threading, select, poll/epoll
* Experience with media processing pipelines (GStreamer, FFMPEG)
* Experience with RTSP, SDP, RTP
* Experience in Python, Lua and their integration with C is a plus
* Experience with video analytics, vision based AI a plus
* Excellent oral and written communication skills

**Qualifications**

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
* Proven experience as a lead software engineer or a similar role
* Strong expertise in Linux application development, including proficiency in relevant programming languages and frameworks
* Experience with cloud technologies and services
* Strong understanding of networking and protocols
* Strong problem-solving skills and ability to troubleshoot complex issues
* Excellent teamwork and leadership skills, with the ability to mentor and guide other team members
* Effective communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders
**More About Eagle Eye Networks**


Eagle Eye Networks is leveraging artificial intelligence on its true cloud platform to dramatically reshape the video surveillance and security industry. The Eagle Eye Cloud Video Management System (VMS) is a smart cloud video surveillance solution, purpose-built to help businesses improve safety, security, operations, and customer service. Tens of thousands of companies in more than 90 countries around the globe have moved their video surveillance to the cloud with Eagle Eye VMS. Customers, including multi-family residences, smart cities, schools, hospitals, hotels, logistics, restaurants, and retail shops trust Eagle Eye for actionable business intelligence and proactive security across multiple locations. The Eagle Eye VMS has strong APIs for the secure integration of third-party systems and works with thousands of industry cameras, so customers don’t have to “rip and replace” their existing infrastructure. Eagle Eye Cloud VMS is the only platform robust enough to power the future of video surveillance.


TvnqiH1KLU
company_addresses: 4611 Bee Cave Rd STE 200, Austin, TX 78746, United States

title: Front-end engineer
description:
Als Front-End Engineer werk je mee aan het de ontwikkelen van onze SAAS producten Apollo en Juno. Je bent leergierig, front-end enthousiast en hebt affiniteit met de UI/UX, (front-end) software engineering. Je vindt het tof om mooie, bruikbare en betekenisvolle software te ontwikkelen. We zoeken iemand die net start (junior) of die al enkele jaren ervaring heeft (medior), maar in beide gevallen het leuk vindt om met een team te werken aan maatschappelijke opgaven waarbij jij een bijdrage gaat leveren aan de look & feel en gebruikersinteractie van onze softwareproducten.

### **Junior**


Als Junior heb je verhoogde interesse in software technologie, met in het bijzonder front-end technologieën. HTML/CSS is peanuts uiteraard maar het echte werk zit in de javascript libraries. Je hebt kennis en de eerste stapjes gezet met front-end frameworks zoals Vue of React en bent bekend met frameworks zoals Bootstrap en Tailwind. Je schrikt niet van utility-first en een .json bestand is goed te lezen. Je hebt wellicht zelf al eens een REST API aangeroepen met een asynchrone functie.


Wij maken gebruik van de Azure Cloud met Python back-end en Vue / Vuetify front-end en maken je wegwijs in onze manier van werken. We verwachten niet dat je op dag 1 al direct onze applicaties kan ontwikkelen, maar wel dat je leergierig bent en onder begeleiding van onze Senior Front-End Engineer en development team je de kennis eigen maakt. Je onderzoekt ook nieuwe technologieën en werkt actief mee aan de ontwikkeling en het onderhoud van onze producten. We helpen je groeien in de Front-End vanuit een praktische context.

### **Medior**


Als Medior heb je natuurlijk al de nodige stappen gezet in de Front-End (bij voorkeur met Vue) en de achterliggende services om goed werkende en prettig ogende software te ontwikkelen. Als Medior Front-End Engineer ontwerp je ook mee als dat in je capaciteiten valt: het is niet alleen uitvoerende taak maar het biedt ook de mogelijkheid om mee te denken en te ontwerpen om de mooiste en best werkende software te maken. Enige kennis van back-end software engineering is meegenomen om de afstemming met de rest van het team soepel te laten verlopen. Je hebt de nodige kennis opgedaan van responsive design, utility-first, en bent goed op de hoogte van ontwikkelingen in de Front-End Engineering wereld en kunt meedenken met het vertalen naar onze problematiek. Als Medior kun je altijd leunen op ons Senior Front-End Engineer en Development team, maar ontwikkel je ook eigen opvattingen over hoe het beter, slimmer, handiger, veiliger schaalbaarder kan.

### **Waar zijn wij naar op zoek?**

* Je hebt een (HBO of Universitaire) opleiding, bij voorkeur op het vlak van Informatica, Technische Informatica, Wiskunde, Natuurkunde of Kunstmatige Intelligentie of een andere opleiding met een sterke technische basis zoals ICT, Software Engineering, Information Technology, HBO-ICT.
* Je hebt hands-on kennis van HTML/CSS/Javascript, Vue (of React)
* Je hebt een begrip van aansluiting op de Back-End middels REST-API en .json en affiniteit met cloud technologie.
* ***Voor de Medior functie***:
	+ 3 tot 5 jaar ervaring met Front-End engineering. Bij voorkeur in Vue (React of Angular kan ook, maar wij gebruiken Vue dus kun je sneller aan de slag).
	+ Je hebt ervaring met Git is vereist
	+ Vanzelfsprekend weet je hoe je dingen responsive kunt maken
	+ Kwaliteitsgerichtheid en een hoog verantwoordelijkheidsgevoel
	+ Je hebt ervaring met opschaling, performance en availability.
	+ Je hebt kennis van REST-API’s, json en asynchroon uitwisseling van data.
	+ Kennis van informatiebeveiliging en security is een pré.
* Verder gebruiken wij de Atlassian tools ( Jira / Confluence), Github en Co-pilot.

### **Wat je gaat doen:**

* Onze SAAS producten Apollo of Juno doorontwikkelen voor veel verschillende klanten (Overheid / B2B)
* Ontwerpen en optimaliseren van designs
* Een front-end-visie mede ontwikkelen voor ons Stratum Analytics Platform met ons development team om onze datagedreven product-ambities te realiseren en betekenisvolle software te maken.
* Nauwe samenwerking met de rest van het development team om development en operations goed aan te laten sluiten.

### **Wat wij inspirerend vinden:**

* Maatschappelijke vraagstukken oplossen met hulp van data en software
* Grote mate van vrijheid en eigen verantwoordelijkheid
* Teamgeörienteerd
* Lean Startup, Kanban, Design Sprints, Co-Pilot, Design thinking, LLM
* Git, Docker, Vue, Nuxt, REST, JSON, SQL, NoSQL, Azure, OpenAI, ML
* Snelle en mooie software ontwikkelen en opschalen.

### **Welke competenties breng je mee:**

* Zelfstandig werken, resultaat gedreven
* Helder communiceren
* Meedenken, -ontwerpen en samenwerken
* Initiatief en flexibel van geest
* Analytisch vermogen
* Zelfontwikkeling en open staan voor nieuwe technologieën

### **Wat hebben wij je te bieden?**

* Wij zijn geen uren fabriek maar een productsoftware bedrijf dat werkt aan kick-ass datagedreven applicaties
* Klein team met ervaren en gedreven professionals met track record in Silicon Valley
* Gave maatschappelijke vraagstukken waarmee we de wereld mooier, veilige en schoner kunnen maken
* Grote mate van vrijheid, eigen verantwoordelijkheid en ruimte voor eigen inbreng
* Investeren in jouw kennis en ontwikkeling
* Uitstekende arbeidsvoorwaarden

### **Interesse?**


Stuur je CV en motivatie naar Bart Rossieau via human@shintolabs.nl

title: Internship Product Management RDL Business Analysis
description:
Eindhoven, Netherlands
Category
 Marketing
Posted Date
 06/25/2024
Job Id
 350723
  
We’re looking for a **Marketing Intern - Retail and Display Luminaries** to join our **OEM team RDL value space** in **Eindhoven**.


Working for Signify means being creative and adaptive. Our culture of continuous learning and commitment to diversity and inclusion creates an environment that allows you to build your skills and career. Together, we’re transforming our industry.


As the world leader in lighting, we’re constantly ahead of the curve. Through our leadership in connected lighting and the Internet of Things, we’re breaking new grounds in data analytics, AI, and smart homes, offices, cities and more!


Signify is one of the few companies in the world to achieve carbon neutrality and our next sustainability goals are even bolder: doubling our positive impact on the environment and society by 2025.


As a Marketing Intern, you will work closely with our Product Manager and Application Engineer to develop and implement a marketing communication (marcom) strategy and plan for social media, commercial presentation, commercial material and maintain existing documentation updated in our website.


We’re on the lookout for forward-thinking innovators with a passion for sustainability. If you match this description, get in touch!

**What you’ll do**

* Develop a comprehensive marketing plan that includes market introduction plan, pilot sampling for markets and valorization of retrieved feedback.
* Create a marcom strategy and plan that includes social media, commercial presentation, and commercial material development including current documentation in our website
* Work with the design in team to create compelling product messaging and product content for all marketing channels
* Assist in the creation of commercial materials, including brochures, data sheets, beauty shoots, and sales presentations
* Coordinate with internal and external stakeholders to ensure successful execution of the marketing plan
* Analyze current marketing performance metrics to identify areas for improvement
* Analyze portfolio to streamline offer towards customers (PIPO-Phase In/Phase Out products)

**Your qualifications**

* Currently enrolled in a Master's , MBA degree program in Marketing Communications, or a related field
* Strong verbal and written communication skills
* Creative thinker with a passion for developing marketing strategies and plans
* Detail-oriented with excellent organizational skills
* Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite and social media platforms
* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet tight deadlines
* Knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite and experience with design is a plus
* Strong analytical skills with experience in data analysis tools such as Excel, SAP, or similar.
* Experience on product branding

**What you’ll get in return…**


We’re offering multiple opportunities for career development, like mentoring, coaching and stretch assignments, with strong international exposure for dynamic profiles. Learning is fundamental to our culture. Through continuous learning, we are transforming the industry. You have the chance to learn every day, acquire new skills and perspectives through customized online programs, and on-the-job experiences.


See #SignifyLife through the eyes of our employees!

**Who we are**


Signify is the world leader in lighting. We provide professional customers and consumers with quality, energy-efficient LED lighting. And our lights, when connected, bring data to devices, apps and people – redefining what light can do and how you use it. Today, our innovations, such as LiFi – internet connectivity through light – and UV-C, solar and horticultural lighting, contribute to a safer, smarter, more sustainable world.


We’re operating in 74 countries with 32,000 people worldwide.

title: Trainee - Software Engineer
description:
We are looking for a Software Engineer to join the NOKIA the Netherlands Software Engineer team as an intern.


  
* Working hands-on with code for developing analytics use-cases for continuous monitoring of Nokia network equipment health based on pre-defined requirements.
* Development of Python code to support various needs including data collection, analysis & visualization.
* Participating in development of features utilizing Machine Learning technics like time-series prediction and clustering.
* Performing automation of recurrent data processing, analysis and visualization tasks.
* Reviewing & validating technical documents.
* Getting involved in network automation development projects.
* Solving technical issues, troubleshooting, and implementation.

  
* Good understanding of telecommunication industry
* Fluent in English
* Cross-cultural and global mindset
* Problem diagnosis and creative problem-solving skills
* Teamwork skills with a problem-solving attitude

  
**Come create the technology that helps the world act together**  

  

Nokia is committed to innovation and technology leadership across mobile, fixed and cloud networks. Your career here will have a positive impact on people’s lives and will help us build the capabilities needed for a more productive, sustainable, and inclusive world.
  

We challenge ourselves to create an inclusive way of working where we are open to new ideas, empowered to take risks and fearless to bring our authentic selves to work
  

  

**What we offer**  

  

Nokia offers continuous learning opportunities, well-being programs to support you mentally and physically, opportunities to join and get supported by employee resource groups, mentoring programs and highly diverse teams with an inclusive culture where people thrive and are empowered.
  

  

**Nokia is committed to inclusion and is an equal opportunity employer**  

  

Nokia has received the following recognitions for its commitment to inclusion & equality:  

  



* One of the World’s Most Ethical Companies by Ethisphere
* Gender-Equality Index by Bloomberg
Workplace Pride Global Benchmark  
* 

  

At Nokia, we act inclusively and respect the uniqueness of people. Nokia’s employment decisions are made regardless of race, color, national or ethnic origin, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, marital status, disability, protected veteran status or other characteristics protected by law.
  

We are committed to a culture of inclusion built upon our core value of respect.  

  

  

Join us and be part of a company where you will feel included and empowered to succeed.

title: Data analyst
description:
+ 3-5 years

+ 32 - 40 uur
+ Data

+ €70.000 - €95.000


* You will become part of the frontrunner in the energy transition, where you contribute to a more sustainable future by building on the growth and development of Eneco's integration platforms
* You know how to transform ideas into realization
* You will implement the desired Data & Analytics solution(s) that will be realized on our state of the art data platform

Why choose for Eneco?
Why choose Eneco? We want to accelerate the energy transition. With our ambitious ‘One Planet plan’, we have made it clear that by 2035, we aim to be the first energy company to become CO2-neutral. No more reliance on natural gas! The entire Netherlands is making the switch. Towards smarter, cleaner, and more sustainable energy. Everyone has their own reasons for doing so. Some want to contribute to a better climate, others switch because their neighbors are doing it, or because they find joy in saving energy, and we're doing it now!


At Eneco, we want to help everyone to take the next sustainable step. And we are looking for the best people who can make that possible. People who are enthusiastic about our mission of 'sustainable energy for everyone' and who want to further develop their talents at Eneco. We want everyone to be able to participate effortlessly in the energy transition. This can only happen if we better assist our customers, remove barriers for them to become more sustainable by listening and understanding their true needs.


Digital innovations help the market align supply and demand and make it as easy as possible for users. Data plays a crucial role in this. From the Data & Technology Services department, we are working to make Eneco a data-driven organization that bases its decisions and actions on customer, product, asset, and market data.


What you’ll do
Our Data Services department is responsible for executing data projects for the Business and fueling the growth of data capabilities by acting as an incubator for the development of data products. You have a pivotal role in multiple projects.

* You translate the requirements from the Business into data driven solutions where you'll be designing data models (e.g., Canonical, Data Vault, Data Mart) that supports these requirements.
* Activities of the Data Analyst are primarily scoped on translating data, reporting and dashboard requirements to suitable data & analytics solutions for business usage.
* The Data Analyst is a critical thinker who keeps on asking 'why' questions until it is completely clear what the Business wants to achieve.

Is this about you?* At least 5 years of relevant experience as a data or information analyst
* Strong experience with SQL.
* Deep understanding of business concepts, processes and data entities
* Solid experience with data analysis, information analysis and business/process analysis
* Extensive knowledge and experience with the application of data concepts, data models and data warehouse concepts
* Excellent communication skills and good command of the English language, spoken and written

You’ll be responsible for* Drafting and proposing business requirements and (non) functional requirements regarding required data products.
* Translates requirements into appropriate functional specifications and functional designs into Data & Analytics solutions and, where necessary, applies prototyping as a basis for business acceptance and technical implementation of the data solutions.
* Designing (logical) data models in line with Eneco's Canonical Data Model to support the realization or adjustment of the (technical) data models (Data Vault, Data Marts) in our data platform.
* Providing stakeholders with proactive advice on new or existing data solutions and, together with architecture, ensures the application of the correct solution direction.

This is where you’ll work
Data & Technology Services has multiple departments; Data Services has 3 teams – an enterprise datamanagement team, a data analytics team and a data engineer team. You will be part of the data analytics team that assist the business in using the various parts of the Enterprise Data Platform effectively to create customer and business value.


What we have to offer
Gross annual salary between €70.000 and €95.000


Including 8% holiday allowance, a good pension and parental leave.
FlexBudget on top of your gross salary


Have it paid out, use it to buy extra holiday days or save it up for something nice - it's up to you.
Personal and professional growth


Eneco is fully committed to help you in your personal and professional development.
Hybrid working, at home or in the office


You work 40% at the office and 40% at home. The other day you decide what works best for you.
Work that works for you and the climate
If you decide on a career at Eneco, you are choosing ambition, growth and opportunities. You will have all the space you want to improve yourself and do your job the way that suits you best, which includes having a good work-life balance. You can work to a flexible schedule and work partly from home if your role allows it.
That is how you can work on your own future and on the future of the world. After all, you and your 4,000 colleagues are committed to our mission: climate neutrality by 2035. We assist customers to accelerate their sustainability efforts, devise innovative solutions and seize opportunities with both hands. Are you ready?
The stages of our application procedure:


Stap 1


Your application
Stap 2


We carefully review your application
Stap 3


We invite you for a 1st (online) interview
Stap 4


Sometimes we want to get to know you even better, then there will be an online assessment and a 2nd interview
Stap 5


Yes! If it’s a match and if you agree, the recruiter will happily discuss your job offer
Want to know more about this job function?
We understand that you may want to learn more before taking the next step in your career. Therefore, we encourage you to reach out to our recruiter, Mark van Dommelen. Whether you have questions about the interview process, the specific duties and responsibilities of the role, or are simply curious about the company culture, we are here to answer all your inquiries.  

  

**For the recruitment of this position, we prefer to handle the process internally and do not wish to collaborate with external parties.**
company_addresses:
Eneco World
Marten Meesweg 5 
3068 AV Rotterdam
company_description: Werken bij Eneco. Daar zijn heel veel redenen voor.

title: Senior QA Engineer - CPMS (contractor)
description:
**WE ARE SHELL RECHARGE SOLUTIONS**



We're on a mission to enable cleaner transportation for everyone, driving the way towards a lower-carbon future. We do this by designing and building solutions for charging electric vehicles at home, at work, and on-the-go.

  


With some of the most passionate and experienced minds on our side, we aim to make charging easy and accessible. Our award-winning services include charge points, a mobile app, and a charge card, providing access to 600,000 charge points in over 33 countries.

  




**THIS IS HOW YOU WILL CONTRIBUTE**


**Your core accountabilities are to...**


Be a part of engineering efforts among enthusiastic, highly capable SDET (QA) team in the Netherlands to develop and utilize best-in-industry test automation to ensure high quality feature launches for Charge Point Management System of Shell Recharge Solutions.  

+ 

  

Apply your understanding of software engineering best practices to guide the test automation team in the development of reliable and scalable automated tests at the integration, system, and user acceptance testing levels and promote test automation to our development team at the unit test level.  
+ 

  

Promote quality assurance in your team by owning the testing process and be sure quality is built in.  
+ 

  

Participate in the team by refining and estimating user stories, planning sprints, daily stand-ups and retrospectives.  
+ 

  

Support peers in QA, through workshops, documentation, and pair programming.  
+ 

  

Design and continuously improve testing process that fits the team expectations (better CI/CD capabilities, code analytics, performance test, vulnerability tests, etc.).  
+ 

  

Conduct exploratory testing sessions or leverage experience-based testing to complement automation efforts as needed.  
+ 

  
+ Own the monitoring and alerting activity on the platform providing a strong customer support interface.

 **THE PERSON WE ARE LOOKING FOR**

  

* Bachelor’s or Master's Degree in Computer Science/ Engineering or equivalent work experience required.
* 7+ years’ experience with relevant hands-on test automation development.
* Good knowledge and experience with Python.
* Knowledge or learning eagerness of Golang to support debugging.
* Experience in testing micro-services, preferably using Consumer-Driven Contract Testing.
* Experience with logging and monitoring, preferably using DataDog.
* Knowledge of the mainstream technologies for highly scalable, reliable and functional back-end systems.
 **WHAT IS IN IT FOR YOU?**

  


Working at Shell Recharge Solutions means working in a fun, fast-growing international company with big ambitions.


**By joining us, you will:**

  

* Contribute to a more sustainable future;
* Become an expert in e-mobility;
* Work in an open and diverse culture with colleagues from all over the world;
* Receive a competitive salary that fits your experience + yearly bonus;
* Receive a **work from home budget** to professionally equip your home office;
* Have 28 paid days of annual leave based on a 40 hour work week;
* Be able to spend up to 5 working days a year on **volunteering**;
* Develop your skills and expertise through several training sessions. Besides this, you will receive a **personal training budget** and set your annual goals with your personal development plan;
* Enjoy our monthly fun get-togethers (drinks), our annual winter and summer outing, and lots of other events or sport teams initiated by colleagues.

 ***Please note:*** *If you don't see yourself fully reflected in every job requirement listed on the posting above, we still encourage you to reach out and apply. Research has shown that women and underrepresented groups often only apply when they feel 100% qualified. We are committed to creating a more equitable, inclusive and diverse company and we strongly encourage applicants of all genders, ages, ethnicities, cultures, abilities, sexual orientation, and life experiences to apply.*
company_description: Shell Recharge Solutions is unlocking the future of mobility.

title: Senior Data Analyst, Circular Ventures
description:
**Job ID:** 245949


**Date posted:** 24/06/2024


**Who you are**  

  

We are looking for a Data Analyst in our Buyback team to join us in developing new revolutionizing ways for IKEA to create a better and more circular life for hundreds of millions of customers globally.
  

  

Our diverse and global team within Data & Machine Learning is growing, and we would love to talk with you, if you recognize yourself in some of the following:  

* A strong background in Analytics, Econometrics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or equivalent (at least MS or equivalent)
* Proven experience as a Data Analyst, with a minimum of 2 years.
* Enjoy figuring out how to use math, code and data to derive insights from large datasets in order to solve real-life, fast-paced business problems
* Ability to translate complex findings into actionable insights for business stakeholders.
* Proficient in SQL and data visualization tools (preferably Power BI)
* Experience working with large datasets and databases.
* Solid understanding of statistical concepts and methodologies.
* Detail-oriented with strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
* Experience with dbt and Google Cloud is a plus

  

On the less technical side we expect that you:  

* Are passionate about sustainability and driven to making the planet a better place for the many people!
* Have a strong business interest and want to use data to make the best decisions to grow our circular services.
* Have a positive attitude and excellent communication and presentation skills.
* Familiar with working in a cross-functional product team. We try to learn from each other’s perspectives all the time.
* Are a team player who takes ownership, builds cross-functional relationships and loves sharing knowledge.

  

This is our wish list! If you don’t recognize yourself in all these points, you might still be an excellent candidate for the role. We like to think long-term and invest in people’s development together with us.  

  

**What you'll be doing day to day**  

  

You will conduct advanced data exploration and analyses that deliver insights, which support and enable data-driven decision-making for our Buyback service. Our vision is to transform into a circular business by 2030, through developing customer facing circular services for the many. Currently we have two services in our portfolio: Buyback & Resell and As-Is Online. And we are launching two new services this fiscal year: IKEA Preloved (a marketplace) and a Repair Hub. Exciting times ahead!  

  

**Our team within Ikea**  

  

You are part of the Data & Machine Learning team together with other Data Analysts and Data Engineers (and potentially Data Scientists and ML Engineers in the future). Together, you join cross-functional product teams consisting of colleagues from Engineering, Product and Design (PEDX), to design, implement and deploy products at scale. Your job is a mix of understanding business needs, designing data solutions – and of course writing code.  

  

This role is based in Amsterdam, in our Digital hub that is housing up to 500 co-workers, located in the harbour area north-west of the city centre.  

We see so many opportunities for what we can accomplish and have the ambition to be a world class team. At the same time, we believe that our work is not just about solving business problems, but also about learning and having fun together.  

  

WE CAN OFFER YOU  

* Work on some exciting problems as described above. Moreover, you are encouraged to spot new opportunities or to collaborate with Data & Machine Learning colleagues in other specialist teams.
* Opportunities to have global impact with your work, both for people and planet.
* Flexible and modern tools: we deploy on Google Cloud Platform, and we use a lot of open-source tools across the board.
* Hardware and OS of your choice.
* A team of great colleagues to learn with and from (with world-class experience across all aspects of Data Analytics).
* Continuous learning (we aim to spend 20% of our working time on learning).
* Flexible and friendly working environment.

  

**Questions and support? Let's connect!**  

  

Does this sound like your next challenge? IKEA offers an exciting and empowering work environment in a global workplace. And as the world’s leader in life at home, you have exceptional opportunities to grow and develop together with us.
  

  

If you have questions regarding the recruitment process, please reach out to Olivia at olivia.de.peyronnet@ingka.com. Please apply with your application in English. Motivation letters are highly appreciated. Note that we can’t process any applications through email. Thank you!
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: Data Analyst
description:
Tiqets is an award-winning tech scale-up headquartered in the Netherlands. We are hiring a Data Analyst to join our mission to bring the world more ways to culture!



Full-time · Amsterdam


Who are we?



We are revolutionising the way people buy tickets to culture and attractions all over the world. Our technology lets users easily book tickets to the best attractions in seconds, meaning customers can enter museums, zoos, theme parks, and more faster than ever.



We are an international company committed to making culture accessible to our customers and our employees. We embed diversity, equity, and inclusion into our company fiber organically.



These values are promoted from the inside out and we strive to represent and honor differences in gender, race, religion, and sexual orientation in our company culture, content, and product.



If you want to join our team, working as a Data Analyst, send us your CV. We might be looking for YOU!


**Our values**


* We are remarkable: Have fun, be creative and celebrate great moments!
* We are accessible: Communicate honestly and support each other
* We are adaptable: Learn, adapt, and pivot. That's who we are!

  


**What you will do**



The Data Team is responsible for supporting the data needs of many teams at Tiqets by helping them become more data-driven in how they operate. As a Senior Data Analyst on the Data team, you will have the opportunity to work on various interesting problems related to Supply Acquisition, Supplier Portal User Analysis, A/B Testing, Reporting, Marketing Campaign Optimization, and much more.



You will work closely with Product Owners, Developers, Marketeers, and Merchandising Specialists to uncover insights about the business, build new hypotheses, and help Tiqets improve through an iterative process of testing and learning.



If you are passionate about Data, enjoy working on challenging business problems in a fast-moving environment, and believe in the importance of teamwork, this is the right opening for you.


**Responsibilities**


* Deep dive into large business datasets to uncover valuable insights that can be turned into actionable hypotheses
* Design and implement data models with SQL in DBT
* Build explores and dashboards in Looker to allow others at the company to be able to ask the right data questions
* Work with Product Managers, Developers, Marketeers, and Merchandising Specialists to determine and measure the right metrics in their respective domains
* Keep a close eye on the ever-changing data challenges at Tiqets, and collaborate closely with Data Engineers, Data Scientists, and other Data Analysts on the team to solve them
* Educate and empower others at the company to be more self-reliant for their data needs
* Mentor others in the team with technical guidance
* Collaborate on the architectural evolution of the Tiqets data model and reporting framework


**Qualifications**


* Technical or mathematical education at a Bachelor's or Master's level
* 3+ years of experience in Data Analyst roles
* **Experience with DBT**.
* Strong SQL skills; Experience working with a modern Data Warehouse like Redshift, Snowflake, or Databricks
* Experience building reports on BI tools like Looker or Tableau.
* Excellent oral and written communication skills; Ability to clearly explain concepts and actionable insights
* Capacity to thrive in a startup/scale-up environment, adapt quickly, work independently, and take ownership of your work
* Nice to have: prior experience in e-commerce with a background in hypothesis-driven A/B Testing

  


Perks & Benefits at Tiqets
* Vibrant, dynamic, international working environment
* Bright, welcoming office located in the center of Amsterdam
* Opportunity to make an impact in the fastest growing tech scale-up
* 20% personal Tiqets discount code to explore great museums/venues worldwide
* Tiqets learning academy: group & individual learning
* Tuesday's Pizza & beer sessions


* Friday drinks
* Sports activities: free gym, running sessions, boot-camp, football, climbing and more
* Pension scheme and travel compensation
* Everyone - employed at Tiqets will receive a monthly internet allowance for working from home
* Everyone - employed at Tiqets can reimburse home work space necessities
* Hybrid working model


Our Data Analytics Stack
DBT

  


Looker



Databricks



Airflow


Follow us on Instagram
company_description: Tiqets is an online ticketing platform for museums and attractions that connects travelers worldwide with more ways to experience culture.

title: Lead UX Designer
description:
**WHO WE ARE**


Choreograph is WPP’s global data products and technology company. We’re on a mission to transform marketing by building the fastest, most connected data platform that bridges marketing strategy to scaled activation.
We work with agencies and clients to transform the value of data by bringing together technology, data and analytics capabilities. We deliver this through the Open Media Studio, an AI-enabled media and data platform for the next era of advertising.
We’re endlessly curious. Our team of thinkers, builders, creators and problem solvers are over 1,000 strong, across 20 markets around the world.


POSITION OVERVIEW


Do you love getting better and better at what you do? Do you thrive in an environment with a lot of change, open communication, and rapid innovations? Then maybe we will be a match!* 

Education or work experience level: HBO, University* 

Location: Sittard and/or Eindhoven  

RESPONSIBILITIES


Our self-steering teams are building a global platform that is transforming the way our users work. Our end-users are all GroupM client teams worldwide and it helps them to execute advertising campaigns more effectively and smarter. We are looking for the person who will help us make the lives of our media specialists even better.

  

You will be part of the data connections team. Together with full-stack engineers, product managers, customer success and users you will discover and deliver new functionality. You will facilitate discovery activities like user interviews, research, experience maps, design, and test prototypes and/or handle usability risks. When confronted with uncertainties, you collect and use data to make informed next steps.

  

Would you love to collaborate with teams in other countries? Are you looking for a challenge and do you have the skills to join our team? Then we are looking for you!

  

REQUIREMENTS

* You have a passion for UX principles and teaching them to others
* You have experience with data centric platforms
* You get energy from delivering full features together with your mission team
* You speak fluent Dutch and English
* You have strong communication skills
* Experience with Continuous Product Discovery is a plus

 **ABOUT CHOREOGRAPH**:


If you are ready to be at the forefront of the AdTech industry, shaping its future, and driving success for both Choreograph and our clients, we encourage you to apply and join our team.
Choreograph is the beating heart of data inside WPP’s media investment group, GroupM, the world’s leading media investment company responsible for more than $60 billion in annual media investment.. Discover more about Choreograph at www.choreograph.com

**GroupM and all its affiliates embrace and celebrate diversity, inclusivity, and equal opportunity.****We are committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, and skills. We are a worldwide media agency network that represents global clients. The more inclusive we are, the more great work we can create together.**
